trends: There have been no other sightings in Lapel
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was out on my way home from getting cigarettes and i cuaght a basketball sized red glowing orb. that was going two or three times faster than any jet i ever seen fly in my life and it was low way lower than i thought it should b i would say it was 500ft to 800ft off the ground if that. i speed up in my car to get a clear look at it i seen it fly extreamley through the clearing. it went behind the trees and mill silo i turned on my road to a big opening that o could see the sky wide open and the red orb was way off in the distance in a matter of seconds. look and see if theres anymore sighting like mine someone else had to see this thing it was way to low not to see thank you
Summary: i was on my way home seen basketball sized red light going fast near my home turned on my road redlight changed course and was far away
